scripts.build-web: bun build src/web-calc.js --outfile docs/calc.js --format esm --target browser
scripts.build-stern-brocot: bun build src/stern-brocot-web.js --outfile docs/stern-brocot.js --format esm --target browser
scripts.build-showcase: bun build src/showcase.js --outfile docs/showcase.js --format esm --target browser
scripts.build-library: bun build index.js --outfile docs/ratmath.js --format esm --target browser
scripts.build-all: bun run build-web && bun run build-stern-brocot && bun run build-showcase && bun run build-library
